articles.title: A lifetime opportunity for youngsters, says Anand as 100-day countdown for Chess Olympiad begins
articles.description: The 100-day countdown for the 44th Chess Olympiad, to be held here later this year, began on Monday with the legendary Viswanathan Anand terming the tournament a life-time opportunity for youngsters to catch a glimpse of their idols.
articles.content:
The Countdown to the #ChessOlympiad2022 begins! #100daystogo and to mark the occasion find me on livestream looking https://t.co/dRwAUCrI0N
— Viswanathan Anand (@vishy64theking) 1650279372000
